original_title: CEREAL / Soy Claudia, soy Esther y soy Teresa. Soy Ingrid, soy Fabiola y soy Valeria.
overview: A kaleidoscopic mosaic juxtaposes images and stories from Spanlangâ€™s cell-phone recordings. Her epos is not only an ode to sisterhood, but also a story of patriarchy and what it represents: colonialism, capitalism, environmental destruction and violence.
title: CEREAL / I Am Claudia, I Am Esther and I Am Teresa. I Am Ingrid, I Am Fabiola and I Am Valeria
